verses.verse: Now the Philistines <WH6430> fought <WH3898> against Israel: <WH3478> and the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> fled <WH5127> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> the Philistines, <WH6430> and fell down <WH5307> slain <WH2491> in mount <WH2022> Gilboa. <WH1533>

And the Philistines <WH6430> followed hard upon <WH1692> <WH853> Saul <WH7586> and upon his sons; <WH1121> and the Philistines <WH6430> slew <WH5221> <WH853> Jonathan, <WH3083> and Abinadab, <WH41> and Malchi-shua, <WH4444> Saul's <WH7586> sons. <WH1121>

And the battle <WH4421> went sore <WH3513> against <WH413> Saul, <WH7586> and the archers <WH3384> <WH376> hit <WH4672> him; and he was sore <WH3966> wounded <WH2342> of the archers. <WH4480> <WH3384>

Then said <WH559> Saul <WH7586> unto his armorbearer, <WH5375> <WH3627> Draw <WH8025> thy sword, <WH2719> and thrust me through <WH1856> therewith; lest <WH6435> these <WH428> uncircumcised <WH6189> come <WH935> and thrust me through, <WH1856> and abuse <WH5953> me. But his armorbearer <WH5375> <WH3627> would <WH14> not; <WH3808> for <WH3588> he was sore <WH3966> afraid. <WH3372> Therefore Saul <WH7586> took <WH3947> <WH853> a sword, <WH2719> and fell <WH5307> upon <WH5921> it.

And when his armorbearer <WH5375> <WH3627> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> Saul <WH7586> was dead, <WH4191> he <WH1931> fell <WH5307> likewise <WH1571> upon <WH5921> his sword, <WH2719> and died <WH4191> with <WH5973> him.

So Saul <WH7586> died, <WH4191> and his three <WH7969> sons, <WH1121> and his armorbearer, <WH5375> <WH3627> and <WH1571> all <WH3605> his men, <WH376> that same <WH1931> day <WH3117> together. <WH3162>

And when the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> that <WH834> were on the other side <WH5676> of the valley, <WH6010> and they that <WH834> were on the other side <WH5676> Jordan, <WH3383> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> fled, <WH5127> and that <WH3588> Saul <WH7586> and his sons <WH1121> were dead, <WH4191> they forsook <WH5800> <WH853> the cities, <WH5892> and fled; <WH5127> and the Philistines <WH6430> came <WH935> and dwelt <WH3427> in them. <WH2004>

And it came to pass <WH1961> on the morrow, <WH4480> <WH4283> when the Philistines <WH6430> came <WH935> to strip <WH6584> <WH853> the slain, <WH2491> that they found <WH4672> <WH853> Saul <WH7586> and his three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> fallen <WH5307> in mount <WH2022> Gilboa. <WH1533>

And they cut off <WH3772> <WH853> his head, <WH7218> and stripped off <WH6584> <WH853> his armor, <WH3627> and sent <WH7971> into the land <WH776> of the Philistines <WH6430> round about, <WH5439> to publish <WH1319> it in the house <WH1004> of their idols, <WH6091> and among <WH854> the people. <WH5971>
And they put <WH7760> <WH853> his armor <WH3627> in the house <WH1004> of Ashtaroth: <WH6252> and they fastened <WH8628> his body <WH1472> to the wall <WH2346> of Beth-shan. <WH1052>
And when the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jabesh-gilead <WH3003> <WH1568> heard <WH8085> <WH413> <WH853> of that which <WH834> the Philistines <WH6430> had done <WH6213> to Saul; <WH7586>

All <WH3605> the valiant <WH2428> men <WH376> arose, <WH6965> and went <WH1980> all <WH3605> night, <WH3915> and took <WH3947> <WH853> the body <WH1472> of Saul <WH7586> and the bodies <WH1472> of his sons <WH1121> from the wall <WH4480> <WH2346> of Beth-shan, <WH1052> and came <WH935> to Jabesh, <WH3003> and burnt <WH8313> them there. <WH8033>
And they took <WH3947> <WH853> their bones, <WH6106> and buried <WH6912> them under <WH8478> a tree <WH815> at Jabesh, <WH3003> and fasted <WH6684> seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117>
